item.title: 美国为南方公司公用事业公司完成265亿美元融资
item.description: 特朗普政府周三宣布，已为南方公司旗下两家子公司完成总额265亿美元的贷款方案，用于资助佐治亚州和阿拉巴马州的新天然气及水电项目。【原文：The Trump administration announced Wednesday it had closed a $26.5 billion loan package for two Southern Company subsidiaries to finance new gas and hydropower projects in Georgia and Alabama.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚在财政压力下瞄准67亿美元养老金资产
item.description: 哥伦比亚正准备出台一项法规，将数以十亿计的私人养老金储蓄转移至公共退休体系。此举有望缓解资金缺口问题，该问题正加剧该国的财政压力。【原文：Colombia is preparing a regulation to shift billions of dollars in private pension savings to its public retirement system, a move that could help ease a funding shortfall that is adding to the nation’s fiscal strains.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉去年在美元严重短缺的情况下出售黄金
item.description: 委内瑞拉央行在去年下半年出售了近六吨黄金，当时该国因美国限制石油出口而面临严重的美元短缺问题。【原文：Venezuela’s central bank sold nearly six tons of gold in the second half of last year as the country faced crippling dollars shortages due to US restrictions on oil exports.】

item.title: 标普500指数上涨，科技股在英伟达财报发布前走高
item.description: 周三美国股市上涨，因权重最大的标普500指数成分股英伟达公司股价攀升，该芯片制造商将在盘后发布财报。【原文：US stocks gained on Wednesday as Nvidia Corp., the top-weighted S&P 500 Index stock, climbed ahead of the chipmaker’s earnings report after the market close.】

item.title: 人工智能颠覆担忧引发二级市场热潮下的严格审查
item.description: 数月来，市场担忧人工智能可能对软件巨头构成威胁，持续压低其股票估值。如今，这种担忧正悄然蔓延至私募市场。【原文：Fears that artificial intelligence may spell bad news for software giants have been pressuring stock market valuations for months. Now, those same fears are creeping into private markets too.】

item.title: 欧盟定于三月启动关税竞赛，为欧洲央行博弈铺路
item.description: 欧盟各国距离决定新海关机构的落户地点仅剩数周时间，这可能成为下一任欧洲央行行长人选竞逐中的首个焦点。【原文：European Union nations are just weeks away from a decision on where to host the bloc’s new customs agency, in what could be an initial flash point in the race to pick the next European Central Bank chief.】

item.title: 安盛投资管理称将因人工智能风险拒绝部分软件交易
item.description: 法国私募股权公司Ardian将避免对软件领域的某些投资，因该行业正面临人工智能发展带来的颠覆性挑战。【原文：French private equity firm Ardian will avoid certain types of investment in software as the sector grapples with the challenges posed by the disruption from developments in artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 瑞银全球财富首席投资官称，随着人工智能蓬勃发展，应弃用程序员转而聘请建设者
item.description: 瑞银财富管理全球股票主管兼美洲首席投资官乌尔里克·霍夫曼-布尔查迪指出，人工智能对软件驱动型企业的威胁应促使投资者将关注点从科技领域转向实体经济领域的企业，例如矿业公司、电力生产商和工业企业。【原文：The threat to software-backed businesses from artificial intelligence should prompt investors to shift focus from technology to companies that toil in the physical world, like miners, power producers and industrial firms, according to Ulrike Hoffmann-Burchardi, global head of equities and chief investment officer for the Americas at UBS Wealth Management.】

item.title: 花旗集团组建专注于人工智能基础设施的银行团队
item.description: 花旗集团已组建一个专注于人工智能基础设施热潮的团队，该团队由其投资银行和公司银行团队的领导者组成。【原文：Citigroup Inc. has formed a group focused on the artificial intelligence infrastructure boom comprised of leaders from its investment banking and corporate banking teams.】

item.title: 美国压裂船队在海外重获新生，页岩油气行业持续低迷
item.description: 随着得克萨斯州、新墨西哥州及其他地区页岩油气田的增长放缓，美国水力压裂公司正越来越多地将闲置设备运往海外，在国外开拓新市场。【原文：US fracking companies are increasingly sending their idle equipment overseas, finding new markets abroad as growth slows in the shale fields of Texas, New Mexico and elsewhere.】

item.title: 黑客利用Anthropic的Claude窃取墨西哥敏感数据
item.description: 据网络安全研究人员称，一名黑客利用Anthropic PBC的人工智能聊天机器人对墨西哥政府机构实施了一系列攻击，导致大量敏感税务和选民信息被窃取。【原文：A hacker exploited Anthropic PBC’s artificial intelligence chatbot to carry out a series of attacks against Mexican government agencies, resulting in the theft of a huge trove of sensitive tax and voter information, according to cybersecurity researchers.】

item.title: 桑坦德银行博廷：效率提升推动人工智能投资增至10亿欧元
item.description: 桑坦德银行执行主席安娜·博廷正寄望于人工智能技术，以期在未来几年实现其设定的目标，预计将创造逾10亿欧元（约合12亿美元）的收益。【原文：Banco Santander SA Executive Chair Ana Botin is counting on artificial intelligence to provide more than €1 billion ($1.2 billion) to targets she’s set for the next years.】

item.title: 德雅尔丹金融集团物色人才与交易机会以拓展财富管理及资本市场业务
item.description: 魁北克省的德雅尔丹集团首席执行官表示，该集团计划进一步拓展加拿大其他地区的业务。这一目标意味着集团需要在财富管理和资本市场领域达成交易并增聘员工。【原文：Quebec’s Desjardins Group wants to expand further in the rest of Canada, its top executive said, an ambition that means it needs to make deals and add staff in wealth management and capital markets.】

item.title: 荷兰国际集团称，逃离人工智能动荡的投资者或转向欧元债券
item.description: 荷兰国际集团表示，对于寻求避开因人工智能发展引发的美国股市波动的投资者而言，欧洲政府债券可能具有吸引力。【原文：European government bonds could prove attractive to investors seeking shelter from swings in US stocks caused by artificial intelligence developments, according to ING Groep NV.】

item.title: 土耳其Vestel公司正就重组5亿美元债务进行谈判
item.description: 土耳其家电和电子产品制造商Vestel Elektronik过去两年每个季度都报告亏损，目前正与银行商谈重组逾5亿美元债务事宜。【原文：Vestel Elektronik, a Turkish home-appliance and electronics manufacturer that has reported losses every quarter for the past two years, is in talks with banks to restructure more than $500 million of debt.】

item.title: 慕尼黑再保险宣布回购价值高达22.5亿欧元的股份
item.description: 德国再保险公司慕尼黑再保险宣布计划通过一项新的回购计划向股东返还高达22.5亿欧元（27亿美元）的资金。【原文：German reinsurer Munich Re announced plans to return as much as €2.25 billion ($2.7 billion) to shareholders through a new buyback program.】

item.title: 西特里尼的反乌托邦式人工智能愿景引发全球投资者批评
item.description: 西特里尼研究公司关于人工智能将引发大规模失业的观点，正引发全球投资者和经济学家的强烈反对。【原文：The idea from Citrini Research that artificial intelligence will trigger widespread unemployment is prompting a global backlash from investors and economists.】

item.title: 澳大利亚因遗产法限制土地开发，加剧住房危机
item.description: 澳大利亚独立研究中心指出，该国遗产保护法规在未考量经济成本的情况下，保护了数十万栋低价值建筑，反而加剧了住房负担能力危机。【原文：Australia’s heritage laws are worsening the country’s housing affordability crisis by protecting hundreds of thousands of low-value buildings without weighing the economic cost, according to the Centre for Independent Studies.】

item.title: 加拿大IPO市场借AGT、Apotex交易寻求复苏
item.description: 历经多年屡屡受挫，加拿大低迷的首次公开募股市场正显现出希望的曙光。【原文：After years of false starts, Canada’s moribund IPO market is showing glimmers of hope.】

item.title: 墨西哥央行副行长称仍有降息空间
item.description: 墨西哥央行董事会成员表示，由于国内经济疲软且货币走强，央行仍有进一步降息的空间。此前数周，政策制定者刚刚暂停了持续已久的宽松周期。【原文：Mexico’s central bank has room for more interest rate cuts due to the feeble domestic economy and stronger currency, a board member said weeks after policymakers paused their lengthy easing cycle.】

item.title: 美国盘前活跃股：Cava、Circle Internet、劳氏、奇趣科技
item.description: 截至纽约时间上午7:45，标普500指数期货上涨0.3%，交易员正关注英伟达将于盘后公布的财报。【原文：S&P 500 Index futures rise 0.3% as of 7:45 a.m. in New York as traders look ahead to Nvidia’s earnings, due after the market close.】

item.title: 西班牙旅游圣地贝尼多姆竭力避免破产
item.description: 欧洲最著名的海滨度假胜地之一正竭力避免破产，此前因一桩失败的房地产交易被判赔付3.5亿欧元（约合4.12亿美元）。【原文：One of Europe’s most famous beach resorts is scrambling to avoid insolvency after it was ordered to pay €350 million ($412 million) in compensation over a real estate deal gone awry.】

item.title: 欧佩克+代表预计该组织将恢复适度增产
item.description: 一些欧佩克+代表表示，他们预计该组织将在本周末召开会议审议四月政策时，同意恢复适度增产。【原文：Some OPEC+ delegates said they expect the group will agree to resume modest production increases when it meets this weekend to review policy for April.】

item.title: 基石XL输油管道项目复活或将重燃争议
item.description: 政治风向再度转变，对这个失败的项目有利。【原文：Political winds have shifted again in favor of the failed project.】

item.title: 南非年度预算要点：债务峰值与税收减免
item.description: 南非国家财政部表示，公共债务占国内生产总值的比例将在今年达到峰值。该部同时宣布税收收入超出预期，并将为纳税人提供减免以支持经济增长。【原文：South Africa’s National Treasury said public debt as a percentage of gross domestic product will peak this year, as it announced better-than-expected revenue collection and relief for taxpayers to support economic growth.】

item.title: 南非预算标志着债务达到峰值的转折点
item.description: 南非债务在经历近二十年的增长后，将于本财年达到峰值。这一转折点为通过减税和基础设施投资支持经济创造了空间。【原文：South Africa’s debt will peak this fiscal year after rising for nearly two decades, a turning point that creates space to support the economy through tax relief and infrastructure investment.】

item.title: 南非拟定债务上限规则以维持财政纪律
item.description: 南非将于今年晚些时候提出具有约束力的指导方针，通过引入基于原则的财政锚定机制而非数字化规则，确保公共财政保持可持续路径。【原文：South Africa will propose binding guidelines later this year to keep public finances on a sustainable path by introducing a principle-based fiscal anchor rather than numerical rules.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利称，人工智能恐慌对选股者而言是机遇
item.description: 摩根士丹利策略师指出，因担忧人工智能颠覆性影响而引发的跨板块过度抛售，为个股精选者创造了机遇。【原文：Excessive selloffs across sectors triggered by fears of artificial intelligence disruption create opportunities for stock pickers, according to Morgan Stanley strategists.】

item.title: 韩国记忆制造商以HBF理念寻求下一次突破
item.description: 高带宽闪存让内存芯片制造商的整个行业都沸腾了【原文：High-bandwidth flash has everyone in the home of memory chipmakers buzzing】

item.title: 默茨在北京直面德国地位下滑
item.description: 德国财政部长弗里德里希·默茨访华期间正面临德国经济地位下滑的局面。【原文：Chancellor Friedrich Merz is confronting Germany’s diminished economic status as he visits Beijing.】
